arts.ttl: Robbie Fowler slams Mohamed Salah's absence from last year's 30-man Ballon d'Or shortlist and labels the snub 'an absolute joke'
arts.sum: The Egyptian scored his 22nd goal of the season on Tuesday night as Liverpool confirmed their place in the last-16 of the Champions League with a 2-1 win over Lille.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot reveals one aspect he’s unhappy with as Liverpool seal Champions League progress
arts.sum: Slot downplayed suggestions that Liverpool’s form confirms they are favourites to win the Champions League in the Munich final later this year, as he admitted he is frustrated by his team’s habit of conceding goals despite limiting the chances for the opposition. On a night when Mohamed Salah reached another landmark with his 50th European strike, Liverpool needed a goal from substitute Harvey Elliott to maintain their perfect record in the group stage.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot confirms Liverpool injury blow as Reds boss forced to change his plans
arts.sum: Liverpool saw off Lille on Tuesday night but Curtis Jones' injury forced him off at half-time and meant that Arne Slot has to change his original plans for the team

arts.ttl: Ben Doak loan stance confirmed as Liverpool star sends clear message
arts.sum: Latest Liverpool transfer news and gossip as an update emerges on Ben Doak's future while on loan at Middlesbrough

arts.ttl: Nine teams advance to Champions League playoffs as Liverpool and Barcelona reach last-16
arts.sum: Liverpool and Barcelona know they're in the Champions League last 16 with a host of other teams - including Arsenal and Aston Villa - ensuring they will play knockout football

arts.ttl: Liverpool transfer news LIVE - Jonathan David claim, Milos Kerkez interest, Alexander-Arnold latest
arts.sum: The latest Liverpool transfer news, views and rumours with updates on Jonathan David, Milos Kerkez, Alexander-Arnold and more

arts.ttl: Arne Slot sends unexpected referee message after Liverpool boss sees Barcelona score
arts.sum: Arne Slot was pleased that Barcelona played out injury time after Liverpool boss saw the final score of their match with Benfica

arts.ttl: Curtis Jones sends instant reminder to Liverpool fans after Mo Salah comments
arts.sum: LIVERPOOL 2-1 LILLE: If this is Mohamed Salah’s last season at Anfield, he is getting a lot of love on his way out after Curtis Jones joined him on the hoardings for a sit-down celebration following Liverpool's opening goal

arts.ttl: Liverpool fans send clear Jonathan David message after win over Lille
arts.sum: Liverpool have cemented their place at the top of the Champions League table after running out 2-1 winners over Lille on Tuesday night. Mohamed Salah...

arts.ttl: Darwin Nunez sends clear Liverpool message as Luis Diaz left frustrated
arts.sum: Ian Doyle with the main talking points as Liverpool earn Champions League victory at home to Lille on Tuesday night
